description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: A look at the VW company's efforts to produce a safer car for the future; talks between Prime Minister Tanaka of Japan and Brandt on Japan's relations with the EEC; the Overseas trade Fair held in West Berlin; the International Horticultural show in Hamburg; music by old masters played in a church near Steingaden; football matches played during leisure time in the Ruhr valley.
